The cross bow was proving to be too complicated to use under such heavy fir=
e.  Yet, Tucson was not fond of using photon riffles or revolvers. He taps =
a long, broken pipe, with his foot and picks it up.  He nodds, and now spin=
s it in his hands like a bo staff.  As heavy fire comes, he deflects it off=
 the ends of the broken pipe, and away from his body.

" Good, but not good=
 enough!  C'mon, impress me!  I'm waiting!"

At one point he effortlessly s=
pins the pipe with one hand while waiting for something a bit more intense =
to happen to him.
